Class AlgFrame 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----AlgFrame
public class AlgFrame
extends Object
AlgFrame.java holds data for one frame of animation.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

AlgFrame(int, String, DisplayFrame, DisplayFrame)
create one frame of a recording.

get_code_line()
return line of code this animation frame describes.
get_display_frame1()
get data for left display frame.
get_display_frame2()
get data for right display frame.
get_text()
return text to display.
toString()

AlgFrame 
 public AlgFrame(int c,
                 String s,
                 DisplayFrame f1,
                 DisplayFrame f2)
create one frame of a recording.

Parameters:
c - line of code to display in code window
s - string to display in textfield
f1 - image to display in display1 canvas
f2 - image to display in display2 canvas

get_code_line 
 public int get_code_line()
return line of code this animation frame describes.

get_text 
 public String get_text()
return text to display.

get_display_frame1 
 public DisplayFrame get_display_frame1()
get data for left display frame.

get_display_frame2 
 public DisplayFrame get_display_frame2()
get data for right display frame.

toString 
 public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object
